item.title: Around 40 Sumo wrestlers have flown to London to compete in the Grand Sumo Tournament, which started yesterday. It's only the second time the contest has been held outside of Japan. #Japan #Sumo #SumoWrestling #SumoWrestler #London #Sport #News #BBCNews
